name: NoWifi
description:
Basically, I had NoWifi while making this game!
SO I know it's BAD!
But I just wanted to share it to you so...

All you need to do in this game:
-Hack Wifi Passwords
-Don't get caught by the Police, by corrupting all the data about you on their computer.
-Don't get caught by the CIA, by corrupting all the data about you on their computer.
-Finish the game! :D

Good Luck!
(AACG mean "An Antropomorphic Crocodile's Game")
